entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
